p: The quadriceps femorises of rabbit thighs were intramuscularly injected with EFEN to test stimulation. The quadriceps femoris was split lengthwise and observed. Hemolysis was carried out using rabbit erythrocyte suspension (5%) according to the previously described method by our team (Xiong et al., 2015). EFEN was added to the erythrocyte suspension. The mixture was placed at 37 °C for 2 h and images were acquired.
